trans-unit.target: TEXT_CLSMIN011_00597_SEQ_00<tab>Linette wishes you to reaffirm your desire to join the Miners' Guild.
TEXT_CLSMIN011_00597_SEQ_01<tab>You have been referred to Adalberta, the master of the Miners' Guild. Meet her at the bar.

TEXT_CLSMIN011_00597_SEQ_02<tab>Adalberta warmly welcomes you to the guild, and presents you with your very own─very <var 1A 02 /var>old<var 1A 01 /var>─pickaxe. Take up the tool of your new trade, and speak with the guildmaster again to be issued your first task.
TEXT_CLSMIN011_00597_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Adalberta, the master of the Miners' Guild.
TEXT_CLSMIN011_00597_LINETTE_000_0<tab>So, are you ready to join the Miners' Guild?
TEXT_CLSMIN011_00597_LINETTE_000_1<tab>Oh. Are you quite certain? I felt sure that you were destined to make the next big find... I pictured you grinning next to a lump of gold the size of your head.

TEXT_CLSMIN011_00597_LINETTE_000_2<tab>'Tis truly a shame, but if you still have your doubts, there is no help for it. Should you be struck by a sudden desire to amass untold wealth, I shall be here to help.
TEXT_CLSMIN011_00597_LINETTE_000_3<tab>Music to my ears! Aye, the kind made when one's pickaxe strikes gold!
TEXT_CLSMIN011_00597_LINETTE_000_4<tab>You must introduce yourself to Guildmaster Adalberta right away.
TEXT_CLSMIN011_00597_LINETTE_000_5<tab>Her approval is required if you are to be formally admitted to our ranks.
TEXT_CLSMIN011_00597_LINETTE_000_6<tab>In case you're unaware, Adalberta is perhaps the most accomplished of those miners who still swing a pickaxe.

TEXT_CLSMIN011_00597_LINETTE_000_7<tab>Her understanding of our trade is unsurpassed, and her flair for prospecting uncanny. Her brain, in short, is a veritable <var 1A 02 /var>gold mine<var 1A 01 /var> of knowledge─much of it concerning the mining of gold. ...Ha ha! Jesting apart, you stand to learn a great deal from her.
TEXT_CLSMIN011_00597_LINETTE_000_8<tab>When you are ready, pray present yourself to Adalberta. You will find her down the steps yonder, over by the bar.
TEXT_CLSMIN011_00597_ADALBERTA_000_10<tab>Well met, adventurer. Adalberta's my name, and I'm the master of this guild.
TEXT_CLSMIN011_00597_ADALBERTA_000_11<tab>I take it you wish to become a miner. Well, our doors are open to all who aren't afraid to work hard and get dirty.

TEXT_CLSMIN011_00597_ADALBERTA_000_12<tab>Thanks to recent advances in refining techniques, it's now possible to smelt even low-purity ores. I mention this because it's allowed us to reopen a number of mines which were long thought exhausted, prompting trade to flourish.

TEXT_CLSMIN011_00597_ADALBERTA_000_13<tab>Truth be told, with business as it is at the moment, we can't take on enough new miners. And few folk make better miners than adventurers, you being a hardy lot.

TEXT_CLSMIN011_00597_ADALBERTA_000_14<tab>What's more, you're well traveled, which serves to expand the guild's sphere of activity. Oh, but I'm not suggesting you join solely for <var 1A 02 /var>our<var 1A 01 /var> benefit.

TEXT_CLSMIN011_00597_ADALBERTA_000_15<tab>For your part, you'll acquire skills that will prove to your profit─a mutually beneficial arrangement, I trust you'll agree. So what say you? You will join us, yes?
TEXT_CLSMIN011_00597_Q1_000_1<tab>Ready to work hard and get dirty?
TEXT_CLSMIN011_00597_A1_000_1<tab>Yes
TEXT_CLSMIN011_00597_A2_000_1<tab>No
TEXT_CLSMIN011_00597_ADALBERTA_000_16<tab>This is...unexpected. You have so much to gain and nothing to lose. Won't you reconsider?
TEXT_CLSMIN011_00597_ADALBERTA_000_17<tab>Then I bid you welcome to the Miners' Guild! May your toils never go unrewarded!
TEXT_CLSMIN011_00597_ADALBERTA_000_18<tab>Now then, here's a pickaxe to get you started. It's not the newest, but it should serve a novice well enough.
TEXT_CLSMIN011_00597_ADALBERTA_000_19<tab>Go on and take it up─see how it feels in your hands.
TEXT_CLSMIN011_00597_ADALBERTA_000_20<tab>Speak to me again when you're ready, and I'll assign you a little task to help you get into the swing of things.
TEXT_CLSMIN011_00597_SYSTEM_000_30<tab>You have unlocked a new class! You can change to this class at any time by equipping the tool received from this quest.

TEXT_CLSMIN011_00597_SYSTEM_000_31<tab>When changing classes, <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>gear sets<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> will allow you to register and save your equipment. You may then use them to switch between classes instantly without the need to manually equip weapons or equipment.

TEXT_CLSMIN011_00597_SYSTEM_000_32<tab>A button for the Gear Set interface is located in the upper portion of the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Character<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> window.
